description: Community Health Posting (CHP) seeks to create an environment and experience for students to a. provide a direct community perspective towards health and disease by defining a specific health problem in the community, conducting a simple survey to assess the health problem and providing recommendations for improvement of the health to the community; b. participate in research that allows application of the theory of epidemiology and biostatistics and to further develop potential for research; c. understand scientific integrity and comply with ethical frameworks for good research and clinical practice; and d. experience and appreciate working in teams.
title: Community Health Posting
